import { Location, Arrow } from "../Images/svg"; const Main = ({ weatherData }) => { //console.log(weatherData); const data = weatherData[0]; return (

{data.current.condition.text}

{data.location.name}

{" "} {weatherData[1] === "c" ? data.current.temp_c : data.current.temp_f} °

Sensación

{weatherData[1] === "c" ? data.current.feelslike_c : data.current.feelslike_f} °

Precipitation

{data.forecast.forecastday[0].day.daily_chance_of_rain}%

Viento

{weatherData[1] === "c" ? data.current.wind_kph + " km/h" : data.current.wind_mph + " mph"}

Humedad

{data.current.humidity}%

Dirección del Viento

{" "}

Visibility

{weatherData[1] === "c" ? data.current.vis_km + " km" : data.current.vis_miles + " mi"}

{" "}
); }; export default Main;
